properties.areaDesc: Intra Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to Stonington, ME
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 20 at 6:47AM EST until January 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and
seas 2 to 4 ft.

* WHERE...Intra Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to
Stonington, ME.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
